overview:
• Responsible for the installation, configuration and management of the Skills Finderâ„¢ Linux/Red Hat Enterprise web servers, configuring Apache, F-Secure Anti-Virus, SAN Backup, Checkpoint VPN-1 UTM Edge X16 firewall, SSL Certificate installations, cpanel, mysql server and general server hardening.
